question: For purity of which of the following commodity is expressed in ICUMSA numbers?
explanation: For the purity of Refined Edible Sugar ICUMSA numbers are used. The new numbers for all ICUMSA Methods are GS1-Raw Sugar, GS2-White Sugar, GS3-Speciality Sugars, GS4-Molasses, GS5-Cane, GS6-Beet, GS7-Cane Processing, GS8-Beet Processing.
